snippet.title: Mayday HD - Gambler Luigi Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gambler Luigi is an infamous unused character in Mayday. Initially intended to be released in Version 6, he ended up unused and viewable only through an event match or by hacking the game to play as him.
In the Version 8 teaser, he was teased once again, this time with an altered moveset, but Version 8 never released due to my computer experiencing a hardware failure.

Mayday HD will restore him back to the roster with a moveset matching the Version 8 teaser; part of the reason for being dummied out in Version 6 was being too similar to Spade. While he's still a deck-wielding duelist, his moveset is now closer to a mix of Luigi and Spade instead.

This trailer also showcases the return of Coin Mode! I doubt anyone will play with it, but for the sake of ensuring the remake features all of Mayday's content, it has been included.
